channel.title: Metrics on Matthieu Jimenez Website
channel.description: Recent content in Metrics on Matthieu Jimenez Website

item.title: Files Metrics
item.description: Introduction Written in Kotlin, this project aims at providing a library for computing common metrics of a C file from Java program. The analysis is based on the result provided by the joern tool. To allow a better handling of dependency the tool has been ported organized for maven and only the parts relevant to this project were kept. This version can be found in the joern repository Use The library is written in Kotlin but can be used from Java.
